@template promo_template
{{html:
<head>
<style type="text/css">
	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 30px;}
	.inputEmail { background-color: transparent;border: 0 !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #FFF !important;outline: 0;width: 320px;font-size: 22px !important;padding: 0 0px 6px 0;color: #FFF;float: left;margin: 9px 0 0 0;}
	.inputEmail:focus {border: 0 !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #FFF !important;outline: 0;}
	.inputEmail.required.email.mce_inline_error { border-bottom-color: #6B0505 !important;}
	h2 {color: #FFF;line-height: 38px;}
	::-webkit-input-placeholder {color: #FFF;}
	:-moz-placeholder { color: #FFF;  }
	::-moz-placeholder {  color: #FFF;  }
	:-ms-input-placeholder {  color: #FFF;  }
	.marginTop1 { margin-top: 15px;}
	#mc_embed_signup form { padding: 0 !important;}
	.btn.btn-info.btn-large { margin: 9px 0 0 21px;}
	.response {clear: left;margin: 15px 0 0 0;display: inline-block;color: #FFF;font-size: 16px;width: 510px;float: left;}
	#mc_embed_signup #mce-success-response {color: #FFF;}
 @media (max-width: 1376px) {
 	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 25px;line-height: 19px;}
 	h2 {color: #FFF;line-height: 32px;font-size: 20px;}
 	.inputEmail {font-size: 20px !important; }
 }	

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 16px;line-height: 16px;}
 	h2 {color: #FFF;line-height: 24px;font-size: 13px;}
 	.inputEmail {font-size: 13px !important; }
 }
#mc_embed_signup { display: inline-block;width: 465px;}
.login-symbol { text-align: center;}






	 .logo {  margin-right: 30px;}
	 .account-container.stacked { width: auto !important; margin-top: 0;position: relative;}
	 .login-symbol { background: none !important;}
	 .logo {margin: 0 auto;display: block;width: 370px;}
	 .logo img { width: 370px;}
	 .content { color: #FFF; background: rgb(6,167,226); /* Old browsers */ background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(6,167,226,0.6) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.6) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(6,167,226,0.6)), color-stop(100%, rgba(255,255,255,0.6))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(6,167,226,0.6) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.6) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(6,167,226,0.6) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.6) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(6,167,226,0.6) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.6) 100%); /* IE10+ */ background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(6,167,226,0.6) 0%, rgba(167, 167, 167, 0.6) 100%); /* W3C */ filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#06a7e2', endColorstr='#ffffff', GradientType=0 );} /* IE6-9 */
	







</style>
<!--
<link href="//cdn-images.mailchimp.com/embedcode/classic-081711.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
-->
</head>


<div class="container"> <a class="logo" href="../$$space"><img src="/$$space/.files/img/logo-colored.png"></a>
  <div class="account-container stacked upMargin">
    <div class="content">
      <div class="login-symbol signUpForm">
    	<h2>Sign Up is temporary not available.<br />
       Sorry for this inconvenience.</h2>
        <h2>Leave your e-mail address here and we will send you an invite<br /> with a promotion code when Sign Up is back available.</h2>
        <div id="mc_embed_signup">
			<form action="//mothership1.us8.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=b5fb849a3e9276e259f879b4d&amp;id=b9a73b3328" method="post" id="mc-embedded-subscribe-form" name="mc-embedded-subscribe-form" class="validate" target="_blank" novalidate>
	        	<input id="mce-EMAIL" name="EMAIL" class="inputEmail required email" type="email" name="EMAIL" placeholder="Your Email"/>
				  
				<!-- real people should not fill this in and expect good things - do not remove this or risk form bot signups-->
			    <div style="position: absolute; left: -5000px;"><input type="text" name="b_b5fb849a3e9276e259f879b4d_b9a73b3328" tabindex="-1" value=""></div>
			    <div ><input type="submit" value="Subscribe" name="subscribe" id="mc-embedded-subscribe" class="btn btn-info btn-large "></div>
			    <div class="response" id="mce-error-response" style="display:none">Please write a valid email!</div>
				<div class="response" id="mce-success-response" style="display:none"></div>
				<div id="mce-responses" class="clear">
					<div class="response" id="mce-error-response" style="display:none"></div>
					<div class="response" id="mce-success-response" style="display:none"></div>
				</div>  
			</form>
        </div>
    </div>

</div>
</div>

</div>

<script type='text/javascript' src='//s3.amazonaws.com/downloads.mailchimp.com/js/mc-validate.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
(function($) {
window.fnames = new Array(); window.ftypes = new Array();fnames[0]='EMAIL';ftypes[0]='email';fnames[1]='FNAME';ftypes[1]='text';fnames[2]='LNAME';ftypes[2]='text';
}(jQuery));
var $mcj = jQuery.noConflict(true);
</script>

}}
